text: Jaroslav Plašil (; born 5 January 1982) is a Czech former professional footballer who played as a midfielder. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League Cup Europe Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Monaco 2001–02 Ligue 1 4 0 0 0 0 0 4 0 2002–03 4 0 0 0 0 0 4 0 2003–04 34 2 0 0 10 1 44 3 2004–05 24 1 0 0 5 0 29 1 2005–06 21 1 6 0 0 0 27 1 2006–07 30 1 1 0 0 0 31 1 2007–08 4 0 0 0 0 0 4 0 Total 121 5 7 0 15 1 143 6 Créteil (loan) 2002–03 Ligue 2 14 0 0 0 — 14 0 Osasuna 2007–08 La Liga 34 4 1 0 — 35 5 2008–09 32 4 0 0 — 32 4 Total 66 8 1 0 0 0 67 8 Bordeaux 2009–10 Ligue 1 34 2 7 2 9 1 50 5 2010–11 38 4 4 0 — 42 4 2011–12 38 3 2 0 — 40 3 2012–13 33 2 6 0 10 0 49 2 2013–14 4 0 1 0 — 5 0 2014–15 34 0 4 0 — 38 0 2015–16 27 3 6 1 4 0 37 4 2016–17 37 1 8 1 0 0 45 2 2017–18 22 0 2 0 2 0 26 0 2018–19 23 0 3 0 9 0 35 0 Total 290 15 43 4 34 1 367 20 Catania (loan) 2013–14 Serie A 28 1 — — 28 1 Career total 519 29 51 4 49 2 619 35 Notes ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Czech Republic 2004 4 1 2005 6 0 2006 13 0 2007 10 1 2008 11 1 2009 8 1 2010 8 0 2011 9 2 2012 11 0 2013 9 0 2014 2 0 2015 6 0 2016 6 1 Total 103 7 :Scores and results list Czech Republic goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Plašil goal.
